Name: Rollout
Effect: Single Target. Low Accuracy 1. Successive Actions. If all 5 Actions land successfully, add 1 Extra Die to the Damage Pool of the last hit of this Move. If the Pok√©mon used the Move 'Defense Curl' in the same Round, this Move's base Power becomes 2.
Description: The user curls up into a ball and starts rolling towards its foe, trampling everything in its way.
